title: MY PHONE HAS SWITCHED OFF AND MY POWER BUTTON AND VOLUME BUTTON ARE NOT WORKING
content: I TRIED SO MANY TIMES TO SWITCH ON MY PHONE BY HOLDING THE POWER BUTTON AND VOLUME BUTTON BUT IT'S NOT WORKKING.IT ALSO HAD ENOUGH CHARGING BUT IT'S NOT WORKING.BEFORE THAT MY POWER BUTTON AND VOLUME BUTTON ARE NOT WORKING TOO.
